nodes.text: This pin-up of a Hutt was a decorative poster available during the Clone Wars. It was addressed to an individual named Gary, and depicted a female Hutt with tattoos on her shoulder, posing in a tight-fitting body-suit. The Aurebesh inscription read "To Gary X0X0.
During the Clone Wars, the poster was used as decoration in the Moshi Bar cantina, as well as a prison cell in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center.

During pre-production of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Lethal Trackdown", a neon version of the Hutt pin-up was part of the facade of the Moshi Bar, as seen in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Two.
